title: ISA in talks with Africa50 to manage USD 200 mn Africa Solar Facility
description: The International Solar Alliance (ISA) has entered exclusive discussions with Africa50 to manage its proposed Africa Solar Facility (ASF), a USD 200 million initiative aimed at boosting investment in distributed solar projects across Africa. This partnership aims to provide clean electricity to 600 million people, enhancing energy access and sustainable development.
